text.0: let us not indra leave the path the somapressers sacrifice.
text.1: let no malignity dwell with us.
text.2: may we obtain completely wrought the thread spun out to reach the gods.
text.4: we call the spirit hither with the soma of our parted sires.
text.5: yea with the fathers holy hymns.
text.6: thy spirit come to thee again for wisdom energy and lire.
text.7: that thou mayst long behold the sun.
text.8: o fathers may the heavenly folk give us our spirit once again.
text.9: that we may be with those who live.
text.10: o soma with the spirit still within us blest with progeny.
text.11: may we be busied in the law.
